Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius). Grease and flour a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Cream butter and sugar together in a large bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Add bananas, flour, chopped walnuts, eggs, baking soda, vanilla, and salt; mix well.
Spread the batter evenly in the pan.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Mix together flour with sugar, baking powder, and salt. Stir in milk and melted butter until well combined. Pour batter into greased dish.
